entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Islet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm except 10 cm near the river. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
